package com.tin.example.falls.sharing;
â€‹
import org.springframework.util.StopWatch;
â€‹
/**
 * title: AutoIncrement
 * <p>
 * description: å¤šçº¿ç¨‹ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹ï¼Œlongå˜é‡è‡ªå¢
 *
 * @author tin @çœ‹ç‚¹ä»£ç å†ä¸Šç­ on 2021/2/17 ä¸‹åˆ1:28
 */
public class AutoIncrement {
â€‹
 public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
 StopWatch stopWatch = new StopWatch("@çœ‹ç‚¹ä»£ç å†ä¸Šç­");
 stopWatch.start();
 System.out.println("====== start to iterate ======");
 autoIncrement(new LongNumber());
â€‹
 stopWatch.stop();
 System.out.println("cost " + stopWatch.getTotalTimeMillis() + "ms");
 }
â€‹
 private static void autoIncrement(LongNumber longNumber) throws InterruptedException {
 Thread t1 = new Thread(() -> {
 for (int i = 0; i < 100000000; i++) {
 longNumber.n1++;
 }
 });
â€‹
 Thread t2 = new Thread(() -> {
 for (int i = 0; i < 100000000; i++) {
 longNumber.n2++;
 }
 });
â€‹
 t1.start();
 t2.start();
 t1.join();
 t2.join();
 }
â€‹
 static class LongNumber {
//        @sun.misc.Contended
 volatile long n1;
 volatile long n2;
 }
}
